## FieldImage.setOnClickHandler() method

Set the function that is called when this image is clicked.

**Signature:**

```typescript
setOnClickHandler(func: ((p1: FieldImage) => void) | null): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  func | ((p1: [FieldImage](./blockly.fieldimage.md)<!-- -->) =&gt; void) \| null | The function that is called when the image is clicked, or null to remove. |

**Returns:**

void
